data_maturity_level.evidence: Score of 4 indicates managed level with strong data governance (Unity Catalog), quality practices, and modern tooling

scope_creep_score.evidence: Well-defined data engineering role focused on Databricks and data platforms, no obvious scope expansion into unrelated areas

overtime_risk_score.evidence: Consulting role at IBM may involve client deadlines and travel, but no explicit overtime mentions; consulting can be demanding

role_clarity.evidence: Very specific focus on Databricks data engineering with clear technical requirements and responsibilities outlined

company_stage_inferred.evidence: IBM is a well-established enterprise technology company with global presence and consulting division

hiring_velocity.evidence: IBM Consulting likely has steady hiring for data engineering roles to support client engagements

strength_details: Strong modern data stack with Databricks, Delta Lakehouse, Unity Catalog, and MLflow integration
IBM is a stable, established enterprise company with global presence
Focused data engineering role with clear technical requirements and responsibilities
Company emphasizes long-term career growth and working with innovative clients across industries
concern_details: Must be located in Mumbai Metropolitan Region - no remote work option mentioned
No salary, benefits, or compensation details disclosed in job posting
No work-life balance signals or benefits information provided
Consulting role may involve client travel and demanding deadlines
best_fit_details: Senior data engineers with strong Databricks and Delta Lakehouse experience
Engineers specializing in modern data platforms and lakehouse architectures
Professionals with multi-cloud experience (Azure/AWS) seeking enterprise consulting work
probe_details: Ask about salary range, benefits, and total compensation package
Understand remote work policy and flexibility options
Clarify expected travel requirements for client engagements
Learn about team structure, reporting, and career progression within IBM Consulting
leverage_details: Strong Databricks and Delta Lakehouse expertise is highly valuable in current market
Multi-cloud experience (Azure/AWS) with consulting background is differentiated skill set
summary.overall_assessment: Strong opportunity for data engineers specializing in modern data platforms and lakehouse architectures. IBM offers stability, global client exposure, and modern tech stack. Main trade-offs are Mumbai location requirement, lack of disclosed compensation, and consulting travel demands.
